name: Sparx-GPTChatBotAssistant
0:
caret
”Alexa, g. p. t. Sparks”
”Sparx send me a carbonara recipe”

skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. p. t. sparks
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sparx is a GPT3 chatbot integrated into Alexa. Sparx is pulled from the state-of-the-art GPT3 davinci models created by OpenAI. All responses generated by Sparx are given by the text completion models available at openai.com.

The first version of Sparx allows for seemless discussion with GPT3 models. Be sure to say "sparx" before every response in order for Sparx to recognize your voice. The conversations are multi-turn dialogs and sparx understands the context of the conversation very well. Ask sparx to send you an email of a recipe, story idea, or any other information you would like!
